title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Hello, we make and sell UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette. This is for making makeup on face and body. The kit is professional and can be used by children and grown-ups. People use this for dressing up on Halloween, for making special effect (FX), for party, and for artist who paint.

In the plastic case, there are 20 colors. Some colors are like flash and some are like water (Aqua). These colors include gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white. You can put on paint with sponge or brush. Paint is very good, not poison, and kind to skin. When you put on, it mix easy and feel okay, color is strong and it dry fast. It does not make a mess when you touch, it stay long and does not come off easy, but when you want to clean, you can wash it easy with olive oil or other special cleaner for makeup that does not come off in water.

You can use this paint for many times like when there is music festival, carnival, birthday, campfire, party with theme, drama on stage, and Halloween. With this paint, you can make many looks, like a king or queen's crown, part of costume, fake hurt or blood, and for dressing as different person or thing (cosplay).

Thank you for looking at our UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette. We hope you like and buy for making good memories in special times.

Hello, dear customer. We bring for you special product for make face and body different look. This product is UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette.

This palette is good for make professional look on face and body. It have 20 different colors like bright gold and silver, also pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white. We think very much to make this colors for you shine and look beautiful in party or artist show.

You can use this for many things. For children and adults, it is safe. People use for Halloween, funny parties, and artist things. You can make many looks like crown, costume, fake bruise, blood, and for cosplay.

It is oil paint but not bad for skin. It not make problems, is friendly for skin. You can mix colors easy for good effect, and it feel comfortable. Colors are strong and dry fast, not make mess when touch after dry. It stay good for long time and not go away easy.

For put on, you can use sponge or brush. And when party finish, you can take off with olive oil or special makeup remover for waterproof. It come in plastic case that is strong and easy to bring with you.

We make this for people enjoy festivals, carnivals, birthday, campfires, theme parties, stage and Halloween. We hope you like and make many happy memories with this paint. Thank you for look at our product.
